section.title: VmSetTag
section.para: VmSetTag applies a tag to a virtual machine. It identifies the tag through a tag category and name.

formalpara.title: Examples
formalpara.para: The following examples demonstrate VmSetTag usage:

example.title: VmSetTag WSDL
example.programlisting: <message name="VmSetTag"> <part name="vmGuid" type="xsd:string" /> <part name="category" type="xsd:string" /> <part name="name" type="xsd:string" /> </message> <message name="VmSetTagResponse"> <part name="return" type="xsd:boolean" /> </message>
